attributes.action: Paid menstrual leave for endometriosis and adenomyosis
attributes.additional_details:
Endometriosis and adenomyosis are know to cause severe and debilitating symptoms and pain which largely impact daily life and for many women are constant.  They are more than just a bad period, And  during a period the pain and other symptoms can increase ato the point of being bed bound, hospital visits, fainting and migranes to name just a few symptoms.  

We should give these women additional sick leave so when the symptoms are at their worse they can rest and not worry about missing work.
attributes.background: Follow in both Spain and Portugals footsteps by giving women an extra 3 day full paid sick leave every month when they are diagnosed with either endometriosis or adenomyosis

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign the following petition, which calls for similar action:

Introduce Statutory Menstrual Leave for People with Endometriosis & Adenomyosis
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/732342
